entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
